data.meta_site_name: ТОО «КМГ Инжиниринг» - Официальный сайт КМГ Инжиниринг
data.text:
In 2024, Oksana Belonozhkina, an expert at KMGE Hydraulic Fracturing Service, won the competition and received a quota for training in the additional advanced training program “Modern technologies in hydrogeology and engineering geology” at the Department of Hydrogeology named after. V.M. Shvets, at the Russian State University for Geological Prospecting named after Sergo Ordzhonikidze (MGRI). […]

Representatives of subsurface users and service companies, laboratory centers took part in a practical two-day training held recently at KMG Engineering Branches in Atyrau and Aktau. The event was initiated by KMGE PVT Competence Center. The speakers and main participants of the seminar were: Head of the PVT CC – K.M. Kunzharikova, employees of the […]

The annual reporting meeting of the management with the staff was held in the Company. General Director Rakhim Uteyev addressed the audience with a welcoming speech. He informed about the key projects implemented last year. – We completed 38 works within the CCED (Central Committee for Exploration and Development) and 16 works at the GKZ […]

The decision of KMG Board is recognized as the decision of […]

Properties of oil and gas” topic. The speaker revealed to future professional experts the specifics of the issue under discussion, in particular, she presented the most important information […]

The authors of the «Selection of deep-pumping equipment» (DPE) module of the ABAI IS are training key and end users of KMG’s subsidiaries and affiliates within the framework of the module development and replication and with a view to its large-scale use already at the testing and implementation stage. KMGE employees recieved advice about developing strategies and plans for achieving hydrogen neutrality in an oil and gas producing country. The […]

The main goal of the project development is to prevent occurrence of incidents and increase measures to reduce negative impacts on employees during dangerous technological […]

The event is attended by representatives of a number of oil producing companies in Kazakhstan, higher educational institutions of the country, and also experts from scientific research institutes. – The main goal of the seminar is coverage of new instrumental and methodical approaches in the field of pyrolysis chromatography and mass spectrometry for geochemical analysis […]
